content:
Hi, everyone! We are having our first Stay-At-Home FHIR® meetup on Apr, 23 at 6 pm Pacific Time (2 days from now)! Please join us to hear presentations from speakers with Google, Roche, UCSF, and Health Samurai. If you have something interesting to share with the community or make a short announcement, please send us a message and we will try to invite you to the speakers teleconference.
Please register here: https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev/events/268549148/.
Hi @Pavel Smirnov, I saw this message only now, and missed the event. What would be the best / preferred way of registering to get notified of upcoming meetups?
Hi Mikael! We announce everything in the meetup group https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev.

Hi! On July 8 we're organizing an online FHIR meetup devoted to FHIR profiling. Together with Rick Geimer (Lantana Consulting Group), Nikolai Ryzhikov (Health Samurai), and Mark Kramer (MITRE’s Health Innovation Center) we will discuss their solutions and speak about the problems they are solving. A roundtable discussion between speakers and the audience will follow speakers' presentations.

RSVP here https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev/events/278718090/
